rectangle "Feature Branch" as feature
rectangle "Develop Branch" as develop
rectangle "Release Branch" as release
rectangle "Main Branch" as main
rectangle "Production" as prod

dev --> feature : git checkout -b feature
feature --> develop : git merge (PR)
develop --> release : git checkout -b release
release --> main : git merge (after testing)
main --> prod : deploy

  单元测试
end note

  集成测试
  修复bug
end note

  生产就绪
  稳定版本
end note
